==Event Duration==
July 23 – August 31, 2021 (UTC+8)

==How to Participate==
[[File:Paimon Extension on Twitch Guide.png|thumb|Paimon extension on Nuke73's stream]]
#During the event, the Paimon Extension will be active on selected streamers' channels while they are streaming Genshin Impact.
#*Users can find which live stream the Paimon Extension is currently on by going to Twitch, and then Browse > Genshin Impact. Searching for "!paimon" may help narrow results for streamers who have the extension enabled.
#Viewers with a Twitch account can hit the "Like" button to contribute to a total tally.
#*Once the user clicks on a stream with the Paimon Extension, a bar alongside an image of Paimon will appear on the left. Click on the yellow button at the bottom of the bar in order to "Like".
#When the number of Likes reaches 2,020,928, each Twitch user can obtain a redemption code (Can be exchanged for Primogems ×60) from the Paimon Extension.
#The redemption code can be redeemed through the official Genshin Impact website (https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/gift) or in-game via Settings > Account > Redeem Code.

==Event Rules==
#Each Twitch user can only click the "Like" button once.
#Each Twitch user can only get one redemption code.
#Each redemption code can only be redeemed once and only on a single Genshin Impact account.
#Only one redemption code can be redeemed for each Genshin Impact account.
#Redemption codes will be given out on a first-come-first-serve basis, and only when the total number of Likes on the Paimon Extension has reached 2,020,928.
#In order to obtain a redemption code after the target number of Likes has been reached, users must click on the "Obtain Code" button on the extension to display the redemption code.
#Each code must be redeemed by August 31, 2021, 23:59 (UTC +8).
#Must reach Adventure Rank 10 or above to redeem the redemption code
#This redemption code can only be used by Travelers on the following servers: America, Europe, Asia, TW, HK, MO.
#Users must be over 18 years of age to participate.
#miHoYo's standard code redemption rules also apply, and can be found here: https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/gift.
#Twitch reserves the right of final interpretation for any question, issue, or dispute related to the use of the Extension (including the distribution of codes via the Extension). miHoYo reserves the right of final interpretation for any other matter arising in connection with the event (including interpretation of this event's rules and code redemption).
